cast.overview: Against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro-futuristic world, Marvel's First Family is forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, while defending Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer.
cast.title: The Fantastic 4: First Steps

details.biography:
Michael Bailey Smith is an American actor. He is best known for his appearances on the television series Charmed, where he played Belthazor, a Grimlock leader, and Shax. He also appeared in Men in Black II (2002) as Creepy, a minor antagonist.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Michael Bailey Smith, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Michael Bailey Smith
